channel.title: Client Error
channel.description: [code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.net.UnknownHostException: direct.oldtimescape.com at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2661) Press any key to continue . . .[/code] It won't connect to my VPS. Why?

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @God_of_servers God of servers
item.description:
@God_of_servers wrote:

RS2 user client - release #317 java.net.UnknownHostException: direct.oldtimescape.com at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2661) Press any key to continue . . .
It wonâ€™t connect to my VPS. Why?
